website_summaries.verdict: An Ariel doll that is designed to be played with both in and out of water.
pros: Includes skirt and mermaid fin so Ariel can be both a mermaid and human
Fin fills up with water during bathtub play and comes apart for when Ariel wants to transform into a human
cons: Fin comes apart easily, so it can be hard to play with the doll as a mermaid for long

customer_reviews.title: your child will be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This toy is practically on usable. The fin part of the toy Comes detached from the doll so easily that my daughter can't even play with it in the bathtub because it keeps falling off. I don't know why they call it a splash princess because she doesn't Splash or do anything remotely interesting. this toy is very poorly designed and there was obviously never any product testing performed before release.
customer_reviews.author: Adam F

customer_reviews.title: Good idea, cheap function
customer_reviews.text: Like other reviewers, the tail really doesn't stay on well and my 3 year old who asked for this for months can't put it together herself. She's still thrilled with it after a few days and had fun in the tub, but will probably like it better in a few more months when she can do it herself. Unless they are in love with this particular doll, I can't recommend it. There is an ariel with a light-up tail that sings in the bathtub that is much more fund and less frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget Havlovick

customer_reviews.title: Smashed up box, doll looks ok
customer_reviews.text: Arrived today looking like the box got ran over. It was in a box with other items and nothing else was messed up, just this box! Poor quality from what I’m used to with Amazon. Doll looks ok. I got it for my daughter for Christmas. Definitely look closely because the tail doesn’t actually fit closely and will come off easily. But my daughter is a bit older so she won’t mind that at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tail falls off easily
customer_reviews.text: The tail falls off a lot. However, it is cute and my daughter doesn't seem to care. But I'd have to put it back on the doll every five minutes. Too difficult for five year old to do.
customer_reviews.author: S. J. West

customer_reviews.title: Tail Doesn't Work
customer_reviews.text: Cute, but cheaply made doll. Hard plastic with some cracks already in the feet upon purchase. The tail is supposed to snap on but the clasps are worthless and it falls apart immediately. Poor design. We will return it.
customer_reviews.author: J Hammack

customer_reviews.title: It pops off quite easily. This might sound odd
customer_reviews.text: Not extremely well built for the price. My daughter loves taking her in the bathtub, but her fin barely stays on. It pops off quite easily. This might sound odd, but I will say her hair withstands the multitude of baths - most Barbie's don't.
customer_reviews.author: KTuck

customer_reviews.title: Nice doll but tail falls apart super easily
customer_reviews.text: This doll missed the mark for us. The tail just falls off too easily and the play is mostly in putting it on and taking it off - daughter has little interest in it otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Green G.

customer_reviews.title: Awful design
customer_reviews.text: So annoying. The tail falls apart constantly and is difficult for a 5yo to snap all together, so I’m constantly putting it back together for her in the bathtub. Just not practical for playing. Also, it holds lots of water in the fins that needs to be drained well, or it creates huge puddles.
customer_reviews.author: Ames

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Price for quality is great. It is way bigger then I thought it would be but it is great. Only thing that would make it better is if the barbie and fin flexed together instead of coming apart with any movement. But my daughter loves it and I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: leisa weddle

customer_reviews.title: Ariel Made A Great Splash With My Niece
customer_reviews.text: Who doesn't love a mermaid? This Ariel doll was a hit with my niece. She loves her. She can play with her in the water or on dry land. She loves to switch her from being a mermaid to having her dress and being a human. Sometimes she even has Ariel wear both. Fun toy Disney with a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Beth9802

customer_reviews.title: This doll smells so awful and toxic
customer_reviews.text: I dont normally leave reviews My 5 yrbold was so excited But after I opened it I could not let her play with it as my hands smelled awful and I had to wash 5 times with vinegar to remove Smells like something that would make one pass out
customer_reviews.author: Rj

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Total waste of money. Tail never stays on and 4 year old gets totally frustrated. Would return it but I can't find the box... waste.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter loved it! Need I say more?
customer_reviews.text: As always, got to me in a few days and was just what my granddaughter wanted for her birthday. The smile on her face.... priceless!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara W.

customer_reviews.title: very poorly designed
customer_reviews.text: very disappointed in this toy.. the tail doesn't stay on at all... once you snap it together all you have to do is touch it and it falls off into 3 pieces.. my grandbaby couldn't even play with it... all she could do is keep putting the tail back on.. now I have to find some different mermaids for bath time.. waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Martha Edge

customer_reviews.title: Tail does not stay on
customer_reviews.text: My kiddo received her first Ariel doll as a gift and the skirt was ripped at the waist. It was a doll she had wanted for a while, so I went ahead and ordered a second Ariel, and the tail does not stay on. It turns out that neither doll’s tail stays on at all and it’s super frustrating. I don’t often write reviews, but I’d send back both dolls if I could!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice doll
customer_reviews.text: This as a Christmas gift for my granddaughter. She loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Tail constantly falls apart not sure if we’re doing something wrong. Disappointed not good quality
customer_reviews.author: Jessica B

customer_reviews.title: Pretty flimsy toy
customer_reviews.text: Pretty flimsy toy. The mermaid tail barely holds together and it’s only been opened and played with for 3 days...
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Not made well.
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loved it...... until her head fell off! Her head stayed on approximately 4 hours after my daughter opened the box. Very cheaply made. Excellent concept, just not made well. Not sure I want to throw more money out to replace it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Hendrick

customer_reviews.title: I think I like this doll more than my daughter
customer_reviews.text: I think I like this doll more than my daughter!? Lol I love the hair color and she is perfect for bath and Barbie accessories. The tail is a little goddie but still beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Aileen Rose

customer_reviews.title: Ariel mermaid doll
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves it. The only thing wrong is the tail really doesn't work like we thought it should.
customer_reviews.author: M & M Rocha

customer_reviews.title: Not so good.
customer_reviews.text: Not good quality my daughter didn’t seem to like it too much and the tail does not stay on, it falls off constantly.

customer_reviews.title: Big head, Little body
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter says "She has a big head for her body, but she's still cute." I ended up buying another Ariel made by Mattel.
customer_reviews.author: KCStacey

customer_reviews.title: No More Moldy Mermaid
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter lives taking this in the tub with her. She had another on, different brand. It got moldy and we had to throw it away.

customer_reviews.title: My daughter enjoys playing with this in the tub however ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter enjoys playing with this in the tub however the tail is hard to keep on even when out of water. Doesn’t stay clipped together well.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful, fun toy. Both our 5 and our 3 year-olds enjoy this toy.
customer_reviews.author: Pauline

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The tail won’t stay on the doll. It continues to fall off and apart.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: We lost the tail after one week during a trip
customer_reviews.text: The tail is easy falling off. Otherwise the whole doll is prefect.
customer_reviews.author: Wenjun

customer_reviews.title: she just doesn’t stay in fin well & fin breaks into its separate pieces far too easily.
customer_reviews.text: Cute doll, she just doesn’t stay in fin well & fin breaks into its separate pieces far too easily.
customer_reviews.author: John McCurry

customer_reviews.title: The doll is a cheap hollow piece of plastic. ...
customer_reviews.text: The doll is a cheap hollow piece of plastic. The mermaid tail doesn’t snap on very well and falls apart constantly.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Bowman

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This toy is garbage. The mermaid part barely snaps together and comes apart with very minimal movement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter had been asking for this for months and only place we could fit it was on amazon!! She loves it!!

customer_reviews.title: Toy
customer_reviews.text: Ingot it for a kid and she seems to like it

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars

customer_reviews.title: But I wish the tail stayed together a little better. Also the dolls hair has already started shedding
customer_reviews.text: So my daughter really likes this new bath time toy. For the most part I do as well. But I wish the tail stayed together a little better. Also the dolls hair has already started shedding.

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Not really happy with this at all. Our tail doesnt stay closed and falls off. Not really what I was expecting at all. If the box wasnt gone in Christmas trash I'd return it.

customer_reviews.title: it wants to fall off very easy.
customer_reviews.text: The tail is hard to keep on the doll...it wants to fall off very easy.

customer_reviews.title: Great fun!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old daughter loves this toy. She loves to play with it in the bath and out of the bath! Great purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: I wish the tail stayed on better, it breaks off the second the doll hits the water but we still really love the product.

customer_reviews.text: The small clip on the tail broke only after a day. I was able to glue it back and it works okay now.

customer_reviews.title: happy happy happy 9 year old who think your Santa!

product_meta.title: Disney Princess Splash Surprise Ariel
product_meta.description: Little princesses can imagine magical moments from Disney's The Little Mermaid with the princess of the waves! This Splash Surprise Ariel doll is ready to transform from mermaid to girl. Just place her in the water and her fin fills up with water. Then, lift her out of the water and see her fin break apart to reveal her legs! The Splash Surprise Ariel doll comes with 1 fin and 1 skirt for fun both under the sea and above the waves. Little dreamers can have oceans of fun seeing Ariel's transformation! Copyright Disney Hasbro and all related terms are trademarks of Hasbro.
feature_bullets: Doll transforms from mermaid to girl
Fin fills with water and breaks apart to reveal her legs
Create stories in and out of the water
Cleaning instructions: Rinse off doll and fin by submerging in clean tap water. - air-dry doll and all other parts
Includes doll, outfit, fin, tail, and instructions

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars281 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
